ygData.subject: xp honey holes
ygData.msgSnippet: I know its cheezy, but at 23rd you can do deepwater goblin pets in Lake Rathetear near the Rathe Mountains zone.  They run to you, no puller required and you
ygData.messageBody:
I know its cheezy, but at 23rd you can do deepwater goblin pets in Lake
Rathetear near the Rathe Mountains zone. They run to you, no puller
required and you can solo them with the all instrument attack. For me 20-27
were the worse levels, I felt like I was useless (MM fustration, lack of
good groups, as has been said the learning curve part, a/k/a dying, sucks)
because I was reduced to doing the pets. But I got over it and just
grounded out 25-27 there, at 27th I hit Cazic (*love* that place, TR is one
of the best camps peroid), at 32nd I hit upper guk (a vastly untapped pit of
xp), at 35 the BR to get over hell (did it in 2 night ;), at 37 (did 36th
the same night) the undead tower and from there on out the live keep and
usual named undead froggies.

Isn't it funny now that I think about it to see the "lguk" people and the
"solb" people? =)

-GW
[Tork@Nameless]
